core:HTML.content:
The SAP Inside Track Registration App is an Open Source project brought to you by the SAP Mentors and contributors. The project for the native SAP HANA XS backend and the SAPUI5 frontend applications is hosted on GitHub. We're looking forward for additional contributions.

If you plan to host a SAP Inside Track you can use this app too! Just request the organizer role directly here in the app via the info menu (when Issue #4 is fixed). Until then reach out to Gregor Wolf.
